descriptionHtml:
Bangla Panjika Paji 2020: Bangladesh & India - A Complete Bangla Calendar (Panchang calendar) for your smart phone. Bengali Panjika apps (Hindu Panchang) is a complete solution for your daily needs. This daily Panchangam (Hinduism calendar) covers, Day of Week, Bengali Month name and current Bengali year, both Bangladesh & India along with the Gregorian calendar dates.

It supports the Hindu calendar (Bengali Calendar app) just like the traditional Sanatan calendar (Pechanga calendar). It keeps you updated about the important days in Bangla and the Bengali Date. The Bengali Calendar Almanac is an informative app for people of India, Bangladesh and Bengali speaking people across the world. This application is a great tool to help you get the most out of your day and plan your days for success.

After install, you can have this Bengali calendar offline and use it. Panchang which is also known as Panchangam is used to denote some elements of Vedic Astrology, namely Tithi, Nakshatra, Birthtime Rashi, Deathtime result, Grahan, shuvo muhurta etc. These elements, when combined for a day, are known as Panchang. These elements change every day with the movement of the Moon and the Sun. Hence, followers of Hinduism refer Panchangam on day to day basis.

In Bengal, we have two schools of Panjika Makers. The 'Surya Siddhanta' and the others follow the 'Drik Siddhanta' or 'Bishuddha Siddhanta' method. For lunar day or tithi timings, Bishuddha Siddhanta gives you accurate timing. We cover Surya Siddhanta.

App Features:-

Grid Calendar - The grid can be customized for the lunar calendar as well as for solar calendars including Bengali Panjika, Benimadhab sil full panjika or nabajug full panjika or West Bengal panjika.

Festivals - Bengali calendar 1426 with English date is the most comprehensive source which lists most Hindus, Muslim, Bangladesh and Indian festivals, Government holidays, Jayanti, fasting days, Sankashti, Pradosham, Purnima, Sankranti, Durgashtami and Shivaratri days for each month. West Bengal Bangla calendar lists all Chandra Grahan and Surya Grahan dates in the year.

Dainika Panchangam: Apart from listing five basic elements of Panchangam, detailed Dainika Panchang highlights nakhtra, Mritadosh, shuva muhurtm, Bangla rashifal, tithi, jonma lagno for each day.

Fasting Time: This app covers the Ekadashi fasting time. There 3 types of Ekadashi system, "Smarrto", "Goswami" & "Nimbark". We cover all the system of ekadashi.

Marraige Table: Bengali panjika 1426 creates a bengali marriage calendar with the time and date.

Bengali Rashi calendar: Bengali calendar new version which gives all the horoscope details with the solar or lunar-based system and numeric system bangla rashifal today.

Bengali festival calendar: All the puja, festivals, fasting days are displayed month wise. Best Bengali calendar new app with best user experience. This app gives short descriptions of the puja and festivals.

muhurat calendar: This app includes all Shub Muhurt, Griha pravesha, Deva Griha pravesha, Pungsobon, Garvadhan, Akkhararombha dates and many more are comming soon.

descriptionHtml:
Discover the Ultimate Bengali Calendar App – Bangla Panjika (Ponjika) 2024 Bangla 1431

Immerse yourself in the rich traditions of Bengal with the all-encompassing Bangla Panjika (Ponjika) app, your digital gateway to the Bengali Calendar for 2024, 2023, and beyond. Crafted meticulously for Bengali-speaking individuals in India, Bangladesh, and across the globe, this app brings the essence of Bengali culture right to your smartphone.

Why Bangla Panjika (Ponjika) is a Must-Have:

All-in-One Calendar: From 2024 back to 2019, covering all traditional Bengali years like 1431 to 1426, aligning with both Bangladesh and India's cultural dates alongside the Gregorian calendar.

Daily Panchangam & Astrology: Get daily updates on Tithi, Nakshatra, auspicious times (Shuvo Muhurta), and more. Ideal for followers of Hindu astrology seeking guidance for everyday decisions.

Festivals & Fasting Days: Never miss out on important Bengali and Hindu festivals, along with Ekadashi fasting times and schedules for Smarrto, Goswami, & Nimbark traditions.

Marriage Dates & Muhurat: Simplify your wedding planning with a comprehensive Bengali marriage calendar, detailing auspicious dates and times.

Rashi & Horoscope Insights: Daily updates on Bengali Rashi and horoscopes, catering to both solar and lunar astrological calculations.
Offline Capability: Access the Bengali calendar anytime, anywhere – no internet needed.

Exclusive Features:

Griha Pravesh & Other Shubh Muhurats: Perfect for planning your housewarming and other significant events.

Festival Insights: Learn about each festival's significance with short descriptions, enhancing your cultural knowledge.

User-Friendly Interface: Experience a seamless and intuitive app design, making navigation a breeze.

Coming Soon: Drik Siddhanta Support: We're evolving! Stay tuned for updates including the highly accurate Drik Siddhanta for even more precise timings.

Your Perfect Companion for Every Day Success:

Bangla Panjika (Ponjika) is more than just a calendar – it's a daily companion that guides you through the auspicious and significant moments of life, ensuring you're always in tune with the rhythms of the Bengali heritage.

Download Now and Step into a World of Tradition, Astrology, and Celebration – All Tailored for the Bengali Community.
